name: Apocalypse Gunsmith [Alpha 1.0]
description:
This game is in a very early state and is only on the 4th week of development. 

Welcome to the first public build of Apocalypse Gunsmith! Currently a simple wave defense demo but with very extensive weapon customization. Pick from a handful of guns and change out any stock, barrel, grip, magazine, etc. Each attachment affects the gun's performance and handling, so you could just try to make the ugliest, highest-recoil gun on the face of the earth if you wanted.

Current Features:
  • 6 weapons, all with lots of attachment options.
  • Earn weapon XP by killing enemies with a given gun.  
  • XP unlocks weapon-specific parts.
  • Basic zombies with slightly different attributes. There's also a chance for mutator waves that randomly change the zombie's attributes.

Currently, there are very limited sounds (no reload audio).

Future Features:
  • A linear level system with a variety of designs focused on a CQB-oriented experience.
  • Player customization i.e backpacks, tactical rigs, pants, shirts, hats, etc.
  • More fleshed out zombie types with different zombies promoting more engaging gameplay such as better movement, ranged attacks, and more offensive behavior.

    • If you would like to follow the development of this or my other game Rogue North, check out my twitter
